divs: sighting detailsaround 6:30pm on october 14, 2012, i was driving down 89a headed west from prescott valley, az to prescott az. my girlfriend and i were on our way to the store. the sun was setting and the horizon was super bright. in the distance over the hill i saw two star-like objects hovering over the hills south of granite mountain. my girlfriend saw them as well and we began to try and figure out what they were. as a helicopter pilot in the area, i'm aware of what air traffic looks like and what normal flight operations are like in the area. when i saw these objects i had no idea what they could be. as we continued west on 89a we passed under the granite dells off-ramp and i lost sight of the objects. i scanned the sky and i found one much closer. maybe 2000ft off the ground just hovering. i knew again it wasn't an aircraft. it was more of an ellipse shape with a solid part. it's hard to explain, but it was almost like seeing a ball spin around an axis rapidly leaving a white trail behind it forming an ellipse shape. twice it stopped spinning on this "axis" and it just hovered. when it stopped it would look like a star in the sky. remember this is when the sun beginning to set and the sky is more blue\yellow still. after about 5 minutes of watching this happen and while i was still staring at the star-like object in the sky, suddenly it just faded out into nothing. we couldn't believe it.
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Prescott
There were no other sightings in Prescott on or around October 14th 2012
Summary: 2 starlike objects. Lost sight, then I saw one ellipse several hunderd feet higher and closer. It changesd shape from ellipse back to star a couple times, then I watch as it dissapeared.
